website_summaries.verdict: A great basic, sturdy case for a great price. Ideal if you're looking for something that doesn't add a lot of bulk to your iPad Mini.
pros: Easy to put on and take off
cons: Some buyers complained that the charging port opening was a little too small and made it difficult to plug in the iPad Mini

customer_reviews.title: Although some may really like this type of case
customer_reviews.text: Although some may really like this type of case, it does not stand up like shown in the description. My previous case was much nicer and actually held up my ipad. Also, I do not feel like this case is super protective.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P  Welsh Jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for iPad Mini2
customer_reviews.text: It's made of a rubbery vinyl-ish material which seems pretty sturdy. The problem I had with a more expensive product was the corner clips which held the iPad became brittle and broke. This case encapsulates around all 4 sides so it can't slip out...it's held in tight. All the cutouts for the iPad matched and the magnetic cover stuck to the iPad face as expected. The cover folds back into a triangle as a support, or kickstand for watching movies. Good value over more expensive covers.
customer_reviews.author: miked

customer_reviews.title: The first was great but the plastic that held the ipad was rigid ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third case I've had for my ipad. The first was great but the plastic that held the ipad was rigid and it broke and so wouldn't hold it in anymore. The second was awful so I did some research and bought this one. It's more of a soft rubber so the ring that holds the ipad won't break. It feels like there is a magnet that holds it together when you use it like stand. Really well made and designed.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S. Watts

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly, what I needed
customer_reviews.text: fit perfectly. Before ordering I was concerned by some reviews complaining that they could not plug in the charger because holes were not aligned. Those fears were not realized. I have no idea why they had any problem,it fits and works perfectly. I am replacing a several year old cover from another manufacturer that had started to come apart, and the only issue I had with this new cover is that it is a tight fit around the edges, generally a good thing, but that tight fit dislodged an old film screen protector which then started to peel off from the corners. I suppose age of the screen protector film was an issue so it was no great loss.
customer_reviews.author: Fred in FL

customer_reviews.title: Good case for iPad mini 2
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be a pretty good case - fits perfect on my iPad mini 2, I love the color. The magnet works great and it’s pretty stable .
customer_reviews.author: Kateryna

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure whether this case would really be any better, but I can already tell that it feels ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this case for an iPad mini 2 because the one I had, which has mostly positive reviews on Amazon (, broke in one of the corners causing the iPad to not be secure in the case and potentially fall out when opening it. I wasn't sure whether this case would really be any better, but I can already tell that it feels more well made and solid, particularly in the corners. My iPad fits snugly. I also like that the case is nevertheless quite light and also has a sleek, understated look.
customer_reviews.author: Elenita

customer_reviews.title: Fits tightly and is very secure
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to find this case for my old iPad. The one I had from Apple had loosened over time and broken at the edges which meant my iPad was always falling out of it. This is solid, fits tightly around my iPad and puts it into sleep mode immediately upon closing the cover. Excellent colour and feel, I am very confident in it protecting my iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case for iPad Mini
customer_reviews.text: Good protection for my iPad Mini. Fits nicely and feels high quality for the price. I previously had a Poetic case, which I replaced multiple times (at least it was free under Poetic's lifetime warranty) because the plastic corners would start to chip and no longer hold the iPad in place. This case is rubber/silicone so I don't expect the same issue from a wear and tear perspective. I ordered Navy Blue and it is much darker than the picture depicts, almost black, but not an issue for me as I'm fine with it. Just something to think about as some colors may be darker or lighter than the pictures on the website.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Colors may be different than pictured/listed. Doesn't vent well.
customer_reviews.text: The color I chose was navy blue, but the picture kinda makes it look purple. I decided to get it anyway. I was kinda disappointed when I opened the package and the color was not at all navy blue, but closer to black, so not even close to the picture. It also does not do a fantastic job with cooling off the device. I've picked it up off and it's been rather hot. So it's not venting well. Otherwise, the aesthetics of the case is great. It fits like a glove and it's really slim. Keeps the device protected and that's what I need.
customer_reviews.author: dpat33

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on buying since the reviews seemed hit or miss with the product not lining up right with their camera, headphone or charging ports but I went ahead with it anyway. (pics attached) mine lined up perfectly and i have no issues with it. the back is a harder silicone and grip the edges nicely. the magnetic feature works and folding it in different ways is a major plus. i have no negative things to say about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm heading out on a trip soon, and my old iPad cover was almost falling apart. I was a little worried when I ordered this one that it might not fit (in spite of the reassurances in the reviews). It fit my iPad Version 3 perfectly! I like the way the cover folds into a stand (which works better than my old cover), and the magnetic on/off feature, (something I didn't have before) is great too. The cover itself has a nice feel; soft to the touch and not too rubbery or sticky. And I love the Sky Blue color. A very nice cover for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Hubble

customer_reviews.title: IPad Stays Put
customer_reviews.text: I love my new iPad mini case. I bought it to replace the original one which had obviously loosened over time, causing my pad to slip out. This case is in my favorite color purple, my iPad fits snugly and snaps into the case, and I can maneuver the case into various positions without worrying about my iPAd coming out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I like this case for my iPad mini 1. The color is beautiful (I got the light blue) and the quality seems to be good. It covers the edges and is very lightweight. The only downside is the smart cover is not exactly smart. It doesn't adhere to the screen as my original smart cover did. Also, the screen doesn't go to the sleep mode immediately, although I notice after a few seconds it kind of works. Other than that, I think it is a good cover for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ozawa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second time I have bought one of these cases because I like them so much. I had my first one for a little over a year, and I use my iPad several times a day, every day.. so it had quite a bit of use. They are so easy to put on/take off, they allow you to prop your iPad for videos, and having the automatic sleep when the cover closes is awesome. The case is not at all bulky, looks professonal, and weighs essentially nothing. I have dropped my iPad plenty of times and have not yet seen any damage incurred.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Nice case but warranty is impossible to access.
customer_reviews.text: I like this case very much but I am disappointed that the lifetime warranty appears to be entirely fictional. I didn’t buy it for the warranty but if you offer it there should be some way to access it. Going to the listed web site gets you exactly nowhere. The case is nice and seems sturdy but don’t expect it to be warranted because you will clearly be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this gor s family of nudists!
customer_reviews.text: They loved this product! They were afraid to go outside due to Corona virus! I ordered it for them and put their mini ipad in.it. I used it and then taught them how to use it. They loved it. We all took photos. This product was just as advertised. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: HUH???

customer_reviews.title: It fits and protects the screen but...
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for an older cover that I loved. This one doesn't 'stick' magnetically to the screen well and doesn't lay 100% flat, so the screen comes on a lot and the battery runs down really fast. I've started storing it flap side down to prevent this from happening, but it's frustrating because my charging station/storage holds it upright and I can't do that any more. Grr.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi M.

customer_reviews.title: Charging port slightly doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality case and I like the material. It doesn’t attract lint or leave fingerprints on it. The only issue is with the charging port opening. It’s too small to fit even the authentic Apple charger. I plan on cutting some of the rubber off to make the hole bigger.
customer_reviews.author: VonHops

customer_reviews.title: No muss, no fuss
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight cover. Fits snugly and easy to put on. The texture is non-slip, so I'm less likely to lose my grip on it and let it fall. My only (small) negative comment is that the slot for the charger cord was slightly off-center, but it was easily fixed with a pair of sharp scissors and a small snip. The on/off magnets in the cover work well. It's a simple cover that does its job.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I order the orange one and the color is not exactly orange but it looks like soft coral instead which I surprisingly love it. It cover all the edges and fits my iPad perfectly. When I hold it, it does not slide or slip out of my hands. It doesn’t have a bad odor at all. The price is also very reasonable. I will purchase more for all of my ipad
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cheap case
customer_reviews.text: Hard to complain for the price but it's not a great case. It didn't quite fit so you have to force it on, and then it was so tight it would press on the side button. The holes and cutouts for the power jack, buttons, camera, etc. don't quite line up exactly. Everything seemed to be about 1/4 inch off. I took an exacto knife and carved away some of the plastic to make it work. Again, it's cheap, so you get what you pay for, but you might need to modify it a bit to fit correctly.
customer_reviews.author: 8675 3oh9999

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 3 stars because the service was good - they were immediately responsive when I had issues with the cover. The main issue is that the sleep mode doesn't work. Also, the description claims that there is microfiber on the inside cover. It does not feel like microfiber to me. The sent me a new cover and I had it in a couple days. The new cover still has the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B.

customer_reviews.title: more than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this thing. I was basically just looking for a protective cover for my ipad mini 3. What I got was that plus the cover folds into a stand that holds the ipad at a comfortable viewing angle and when you close the cover it puts the ipad into sleep mode. You can open it up then and see the lock screen and the time display. I guess if I had read the specs more carefully I would have known that these additional features were present. I like this cover for my Ipad mini 3. It is simple and effective and I look at the added features as the icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: Trim, fits well, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this. I got rid of my detachable keyboard, which I wasn't using, and replaced it with this slim cover. My iPad mini now slips easily into a pocketbook. When the cover is folded into a triangle it holds up the screen pretty well, not perfectly. I ordered a light color which looks nice and matches the iPad. It does collect some finger smudges, but I wipe them off and it still looks good after a lot of use traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Pat C.

customer_reviews.title: Read before  buying
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the Color and it is good for adjusting viewing angle but, the charging port opening is not aligned correctly, making it difficult to put the charger in, (even genuine Apple charger). You have to try to pull it back to insert, making it very oodifficult for a child and impossible if you are using some non Apple lightning chargers, like the one pictured in photo. I liked using that one for my granddaughter because it is long and a sturdy flexible metal material but, it does not work with this case.
customer_reviews.author: crystal lemieux

customer_reviews.title: This iPad mini is perfect. the color is as expected and the material ...
customer_reviews.text: This iPad mini is perfect. the color is as expected and the material is nice and a little soft. We love it. The seller is doing a very good job in following up if everything is to your satisfaction which helps. I would but from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Funsparks

customer_reviews.title: almost good
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should except for one pretty dumb goof —- it partially blocks the FireWire port! I fixed the problem with a pair of scissors but the mere existence of such a stupid defect clearly shows the maker/designer never bothered to try out the product before putting it on sale. Makes the customer into an involuntary beta tester.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: Not as flexible as two piece cover/case.
customer_reviews.text: The cover is much stiffer than OEM Apple cover, and it tends to not want to stay folded on cold environment. Otherwise it’s fine when it’s flat on back or covering screen. If the cover was a separate piece from the case, it would have been much nicer. Shop and learn I guess.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Custom Case
customer_reviews.text: It is so difficult to see the numbers on the back of this I pad that I was afraid I had made a mistake. Actually this was better than the description. I expected the same type magnetic back as on my original pad but this is a custom design that snugly fits around the body, like a flexible bottom sheet and the three fold cover closes readily. Really nice. I did have to open the connection slot slightly to allow port connection but it was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Suzalah

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: My old iPad case was looking like an embarrassment. It was flaking, pealing and just about up to its last stretch of life. I decided to buy this and am happy I did because it fit perfectly. Felt great to hold and had a non slip feel to it. So far it's just the first day of use. Let's hope this holds up longer then the last one.
customer_reviews.author: MadHatter

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of the product - it's light and thin but still sturdy and just what I needed. I take my iPad out daily and it was much easier to put in and out than I expected! LOVE IT - Note that the GOLD is very shiny and I would have chosen another more muted color had I realized but I have gotten used to it! Just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Susan in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Nice case but not durable
customer_reviews.text: This case looks more beautiful in person. But I don’t think it’s gonna last long. You can see the small scratch from my finger nail on the front case while I just put on the case for the first time! I’m gonna be extremely be careful when using this to avoid leaving marks. But I expected the outside of the front case to be more durable, while the inside remains soft like it is now. Good case, but could be better.
customer_reviews.author: TN&HN

customer_reviews.title: a year later still great
customer_reviews.text: after reading some of negative reviews i still purchased it and now been using it for a year, i keep it in a dry area, never close to water. still looks brand new, very sleep and pretty. functional and protective. just what i needed
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a very small thin cover that was genuine Apple for my IPAD MINI 2. It only covered the screen side and was always coming loose since it was held on by a magnet. This case gives protection on both sides, as well as making a much sturdier stand. VERY pleased with the quality and price. If I had to come up with a negative I will say the picture looks more turquoise but in reality it is more light blue. But not enough of an issue for me to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: southern belle

customer_reviews.title: Good iPad case, but not kids friendly
customer_reviews.text: Pros ------ (*) Good quality product to protect iPad (*) It fits perfectly and securely hold the iPad (*) The top case folds well to keep the iPad hold standing to watch movies hands-free (*) iPad moved to standby mode as soon as the top cover is placed on the screen Cons: ------- (*) The connector between the case and the top cover is not very strong. it will break quickly if it is used by kids.
customer_reviews.author: NilatS

customer_reviews.title: Fun color and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the color. I will say that it's not the quality of the true Apple covers but the latter did not offer many choices. I like blue and this was similar to my original color. The material feels cheaper than Apple covers but then again, this purchase was less money. So, I expected the quality to be less. The battery life is excellent and I expect the durability to be good. I would buy again because of the color choices offered.
customer_reviews.author: JMP

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations, better than the original Apple cover
customer_reviews.text: It is inexpensive, durable, and works as advertised. While the Apple cover is stylish, it fell apart in less than a year and doesn’t protect the iPad mini 2 as well as this one does.
customer_reviews.author: James West

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Great IPad mini cover. Fits much better than the last two we have had to replace from a different company. It is slightly flexible which makes the fit better giving easy access to plugs. Wish we had found this brand a couple of years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color is not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very bummed I bought this for a gift for my mother-in-law and she liked the purple so that is what I ordered. She received one that is pink, not purple. :( I am giving it two stars because it was delivered overnight which is awesome but I really wish the color had been correct!
customer_reviews.author: MRMITCHAM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay in sleep mode easily
customer_reviews.text: I like this case for ease of holding, but the least bit of a bump and it is not in sleep mode. I’ve run the iPad down 4 times already because it wasn’t quite on or I bumped it. I guess I’m just going to have to keep looking for one that actually matches like my last cover did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad Case
customer_reviews.text: I like this case. I bought it to replace an Apple smart cover that was falling apart. This case is better cause it covers and protects the entire iPad. It was easy to put on and fits snuggly. I hope to get great use out of it. I'd recommend buying if you're looking to protect your iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Crizz

customer_reviews.title: Nice iPad Cover
customer_reviews.text: My Apple brand iPad cover came apart at the magnet hinge because I like to use the triangular base it forms as a means of holding it (not on a desk or table). The instability caused too much stress on the hinge. This cover wraps completely around the iPad, making it a more stable base when handheld. It seems like it will last a lot longer than the previous one (and at half the cost). The openings for camera, buttons, and jacks are in exactly the right places.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek iPad cover
customer_reviews.text: I had my old iPad cover for about 5 years and it was on its final leg so I bought this one as a replacement. I really like it so far. It fits snugly around my iPad and the front flap doubles as a stand when I want to watch a movie. I was skeptical of the magnetic cover, but haven't had any issues with it at all. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case partially covers camera lens, but great product
customer_reviews.text: Just received my case. It fits iPad mini great except for the fact for the camera is partially covered (pic enclosed). (Reason for 3 stars) Will keep it because I don’t really use my camera, but if I need to, it’s easy to remove. Looks well made, but just received so will see how long it lasts, but for price and he fact Apple no longer makes this for this model. Look forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: This is not the Apple smart cover, but it works fine
customer_reviews.text: This is not the Apple smart cover, for the iPad mini retina, Apple does not sell the cover any longer. The only thing that one has to be aware is that the cover does not have the same hardware as the Apple, so you need to go to settings and program the iPad to sleep when the cover is closed. The product is sturdy, has a good feel, I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jose R. Brunheroto

customer_reviews.title: High quality case
customer_reviews.text: I have the old iPad mini and was worried I wouldn’t find a corresponding case. The DTTO case is perfect. It feels high quality, has a nice tactile feel so I don’t feel like the iPad will just slip out of my hands, and the color!! I got the “bright orange” color. You should know that the color is true to the product photos, a light coral color, which is what I wanted so I’m happy! the case works well as a stand and I appreciate the magnet closure that keeps it in “stand” form. Overall, great quality product. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Better than Apple mini I-pad cover
customer_reviews.text: I like it better than the Apple cover I had, because it covers the whole I-pad. It also is half the price of the Apple I-pad cover and truly just as good. I enjoyed the wide variety of colors I have had it for two months . So far great durability. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little case. My daughter uses our ipad more than the rest of our family. She is in love with the mint green color and so this was a great purchase. It is withstanding an 8 year old using it every day whether rollerskating in our driveway, listening to music or just bangin around the house. She has put this case through the ringer and it still looks great. Can't ask much more than that from a case!
customer_reviews.author: Whitbecks

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: I should have sent it back. The cut out where you need to charge the ipad is too small....really frustrating. You have to stretch it when you need to charge. Cute color
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Handle
customer_reviews.text: My previous case for mi iPad mini was a Khomo and held up well for over 3 years. When the layers began to separate, I thought I’d go along with this “Amazon’s Choice” product. The problem with this cover is a combination of poor grip (the surface is too smooth and slippery) and overal handling (the top cover hinge is too floppy and loose so it does not feel secure in my hands). I’m returning it today and will go with the Khomo again- I hope it’s as good as the old one!
customer_reviews.author: dean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, durable protection
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit perfectly, with precision cutouts for all Ipad Mini 8 controls. The cover is durable, folds into a viewing stand and has auto on-off on opening or closing. It was a very reasonable costs, with fast shipping. Just be certain you have the correct model number for your IPad when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: JHeckel

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover is nice looking and works as advertised. The only reason it's a 4 star in my opinion is the home key has to be on the right when using landscape. My preference is to have it on the left. Other cases have either been neutral or on the left. If I ever need another case, I will shop a bit differently for it.
customer_reviews.author: PEZ

customer_reviews.title: Nah. Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Even though the description lists my model of iPad, this cover is way tight and kept popping off lengthwise edge. Too tight for me. I didn’t like the feel of the plastic material either. There are other choices.
customer_reviews.author: jislove

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Wish the lid was magnetic to the back as you need to hold the cover if you want to use it hand held. Other than that it’s pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Drummer

customer_reviews.title: Very slim and lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: So slim and lightweight it fit perfectly in my bag as I trekked to Everest Base Camp and during my flights. My iPad mini 1 falls asleep once the cover closes and that saves a lot of battery and helps protect the screen. It has already fallen a few times and the case has been able to protect my iPad and mine does not have a screen protector. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I changed to this one...
customer_reviews.text: I owned two previous covers that had a "frosted" plastic back and both cracked and broke. I really like my DTTO case. It fits beautifully, all the cut-outs and other buttons fit exactly, and the rubberized back means no more cracked covers- much more secure. It feels good in my hand. I do wish the closing magnet was a bit stronger. I love the red color that I bought.
customer_reviews.author: SLROregon

customer_reviews.title: DTTO Ipad mini case
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and it fits perfect and keeps my Ipad protected. I wish I saw this earlier. I went to an Apple store last year and they didn't even have it in their store or on line at the time. Also like that I can bend the other part of the cover and use it as a support stand. J.T.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Tourigny

customer_reviews.title: Mini Cover
customer_reviews.text: I like this cover but I preferred my previous one with a magnet allowing to set aside the screen cover when Im taking photos. I'm modifying this one to do that with the old magnet from my wornout cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sally S.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Sleep mode? Doesn’t put my iPad to sleep. You get what you pay for. It does the job. Thought there would be a hard back but it does not. Whole thing is flexible. The iPad itself provides the stiff back. Pretty much met my expectations. No more.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The little mini-IPad case is lightweight and I love the color. I am nervous about the durability - hoping it doesn't tear from folding back but, so far, it is holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnielee

customer_reviews.title: Great protection & so good looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. I wasn't sure about it having a "soft body" but now I believe it adds a layer of protection. It fits well, feels nice and looks GREAT. Very slight metallic sheen gives it visual interest without being too trendy (I got the dark blue). Very happy with purchase. Will buy again if I upgrade one day.
customer_reviews.author: Quantum Anjel

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic cover case is sleek and feels nice on the touch. It's lightweight also, almost does not add to the thickness of iPad mini. All the holes are in right places, does not block access to any. Don't know about durability: just using it for a week. But if it can survive at least a year I would still consider it a bargain at $12.99.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really durable better than a previous one I had bought that had a plastic backing and broke little by little everytime it was dropped (kids). However this one has a silicone backing and it’s still holding up perfectly. Black color is great because I can’t see all the stains like my previous light green.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best case for the $$
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many Ipad Mini cases over the years for my mini. Now that I've passed it down to my kids, the need to replace cases is mostly due to the amount of dirt they track and plastic splitting. This is the first case I've received that has high quality. It's the best I've purchased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Drea_Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, great for low price
customer_reviews.text: Nice blue color, great for in-home use. Stands up nicely... firm enough to watch something, but you would have to hold it if you wanted to type a lot and it not to fall over. Using flat it is perfect, as the front flap folds back perfectly flat.
customer_reviews.author: JMcMaken

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good value and like the color options. At first wasn't sure sleep mode was working but it's okay and tablet turns off when I close the cover. Why pay more?
customer_reviews.author: S.Strangefire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and very nice co.or
customer_reviews.text: Fit my iPad very well. Easy to put on. Fingers crossed re durability. Only time will tell. Delivered on time and well packaged. Many colors to pick from. I like bright colors so device is easy to see / find
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: Will not accommodate screen protectors with any depth
customer_reviews.text: An okay case, but unfortunately if you use a screen protector any deeper than a piece of cling film, this case will not accommodate it.
customer_reviews.author: Petra L.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality case.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality of the case. Material is good and pleasant to touch. Works good, closes softly and quietly. Great purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Valery Tarasau

customer_reviews.title: Good Cover, Spoiled Shipping
customer_reviews.text: This cover for my iPad mini works as expected and was a good value. The reason I docked it one star is because the cover was bent in the shipping envelope, causing the front cover to fit off-center and not close completely. Should have shipped it in a box or added a plastic stiffener to better protect it
customer_reviews.author: LandPyro

customer_reviews.title: Light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I use my mini iPad for travel and put it in my handbag. I wanted it to be very light weight and easy to handle. It is exactly that. Seems very durable. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Gemini

customer_reviews.title: Sleek look, looks well made
customer_reviews.text: It was delayed in arriving but that had nothing to do with the actual seller but with Amazon delivery (again). It looks really well made, and I am hoping it will be durable. The previous one lasted me almost 4 years therefore I am hoping this one will last long as well. It looks really sleek in design, and the color (red) is really nice. Easy to find when we displace it :-)
customer_reviews.author: mila

customer_reviews.title: Fits older ipad mini perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This ipad case arrived promptly and fit my aging ipad mini perfectly. It is not as soft as the original apple case but that is not a problem and the price was right. Also, the dark color may look better longer than the old lighter colored case.
customer_reviews.author: "V" on the beach

customer_reviews.title: durable case
customer_reviews.text: i have had this case for 3 years and it has been great! very durable case & still looks as though it’s brand new. it hasn’t fallen apart at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a good product at a good price. It seems like it will wear well but time will tell about that.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Not great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He doesn’t like the fact that the cover make the screen protector come loose at the corner
customer_reviews.author: SMGibson

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful, sturdy and fits my mini perfectly. The back is supple and protects my iPad from scratches, but holds the tablet very securely. Great product with a LIFETIME WARRANTY! Can’t beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Em's

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my new (donated) Ipad Mini. It's beautiful, sturdy, and works great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Harris

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly the color I was hoping for and it is perfect for my ipad mini! Thank you!! Great product for a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: It works as well as you might expect.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for... it was bought to protect an old iPad Mini 2 which is worth diddly on the resale market so handed down to a friend's kids. So it does what it needs to at a low price: Bare minimum protection for a piece of hardware soon to be in a reccyling bin. No more or less.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Great little case.
customer_reviews.text: Great product unless you put protective glass over your main glass face. I’m going to try to put the next glass on with the iPad already in this case..
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: Best iPad Case I've Ever Purchased
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! It is light-weight, easy to use, and is shock-resistant. I would purchase this again if I never needed to but the one I have is still in perfect condition. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Francis

customer_reviews.title: Good for Adult Use
customer_reviews.text: I like that my iPad mini 3 fits really well. I don't have to worry about it falling out of the cover. I do wish that the cover was more sturdy/thicker. It is a bit flimsy. This would NOT work for a child, but does provide adequate protection for teen/adult use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephani

customer_reviews.title: Fits my iPad 3 mini perfectly - nice feel, easy to slip iPad in and out
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in two days with Prime. Has a great texture and feel. I was impressed with the packaging and finish - very Apple like. Does just what it says, stand functionality and magnetic switch capability work perfect. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Just John

customer_reviews.title: Really good value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is inexpensive and light. I am really happy with this in my one-week of use. The only thing thing that I would change is that when the cover is folded over, it does not stay together as tightly as I would like. Overall, I am very happy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Lighter than the original iPad Mini case
customer_reviews.text: This iPad is old and cracked but the original cover looked shabby. We haven't had it long enough to check easy to clean, but it popped right on and is doing a fine job. I wish we'd purchased this earlier.
customer_reviews.author: LindaSIANC

customer_reviews.title: DTTO Mini Case for iPad Mini 3/2/1
customer_reviews.text: A well made easy install product, that is more durable than what I had before. I expect this case to last because it is made with better material! Thanks-Scotty
customer_reviews.author: SCOTTY

customer_reviews.title: Solidly rubberish
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a reinforced poly fabric like I had on my Fire, but it is rubberized and I think I like it better. I feel as secure as is possible with this case/cover. I just wish it was a few more degrees rigid, but overall I am satisfied ad would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: tleo

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Is this really for an iPad mini? The camera hole and volume control slots do not line up. And, it is trying to pop off the bottom left corner. As I had this brand for my bigger iPad and was very satisfied, I am extremely disappointed, but too lazy to return it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Quality, elegance and style
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a protector for ipad mini 1 this is the ideal model, look no further. It adheres perfectly and the material is incredible you will not believe what you have for the price and quality. Excellent DTTO
customer_reviews.author: AP/ALEX

customer_reviews.title: solid standard case, good value
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described; durable, good quality, serves the purpose of protection and a stand for viewing. I would recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Fits well on the iPad
customer_reviews.text: I love the flexibility and how it contours to the iPad. It isn't very sturdy and I understand that due to it being bendable to prop it up. It does exactly what it was designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: the cover slips on and stays in place. Easily folds the cover and it stands on its own for reading while working.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I had a red case like this I purchased at Apple with my Ipad mini that was a way better quality. This case does not wake the ipad when I open it, nor put in in sleep mode when I close it. Its ok, but nothing like what I had. I do feel that my ipad is protected though, which is what I needed most.
customer_reviews.author: honeylove

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Case
customer_reviews.text: Case cover is beautiful, very easy to use and easy to clean. It puts the tablet to sleep and wakes it up as advertised. One concern is the soft back cover. My last one has a plastic “holder” for the tablet giving it additional protection from accidental drops. I also find it a bit difficult to make the stand work. properly.
customer_reviews.author: klzchaz

customer_reviews.title: Functional & Flexible
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have a cover for my iPad Mini when the other one broke. It was the second time I'd had an issue with the other kind so I was happy to find a new option. This one is good and it was hard to choose between so many colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Touches pretty well and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Touches pretty well and looks great! Standing support is useful. My last case is badly worn and got this new one, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lorentz

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the new cover.
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar cover for many yr- since the ipad minis first came out. However, it was made of different materials- hard shell back and softer microfiber (?) front cover. Thi new cover just arrived and while I have not used it yet I like it much better. First of all the color (navy blue) is very nice- not exactly iridescent but it has an attractive sheen and is a soft navy, not too dark. And I was never able to figure out how the stand worked on my old cover (even though it looks the same) but this one works great. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kadori

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install charger without taking the cover off!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cover but having to remove to charge is a pain I am able to keep the cover on but it is most difficult to plug the charger in.Am very happy that the cover is not plastic since the last two broke. Amazon prime fan! San Diego LAS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great slim case!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite style of case for my iPad mini. Case came quickly, fit perfectly and doesn’t impede button function. I love the option to stand it up for watching videos, and also the protection for the screen when I throw it in my bag. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

product_meta.title: DTTO Mini Case for iPad Mini 3/2/1, (Not Compatible with Mini 5th Generation 2019) Ultra Slim Lightweight Smart Case Trifold Cover Stand with Flexible Soft TPU Back Cover [Auto Sleep/Wake],Navy Blue
feature_bullets: Ultra slim and lightweight case designed specifically for Apple iPad Mini 1/2/3 ALL models. Please Note: NOT fit for iPad Mini 5 2019 and iPad mini 4.
Premium synthetic leather exterior and soft, color-matched microfiber lining with soft flexible TPU back cover. Smooth TPU material feels great and leaves no fingerprint nor scratch.
Tri-fold front cover with dual standing positions for facetime, movie viewing and keyboard typing. Magnetic smart cover supports fast response auto sleep/wake function.

Air cushion technology and honeycomb pattern provide better shock absorb function and better thermal dissipation.With soft flexible TPU back, you'll never worry about leaving scratches on your precious iPad.

Precise cut-outs and openings for Apple iPad Mini 1 (2012), iPad Mini 2 (2013), iPad Mini 3 (2014) with easy access to all tablet features. Easy to install and remove. Lifetime warranty offered by DTTO. Please search "DTTO" for other accessories.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,392 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
